user_data.target_needs: I wanted to find comfortable and supportive bras that fit well and could be worn throughout the day without discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to the promise of true support and comfort in a wireless bra, as highlighted in the product description. However, my experience did not meet my expectations, as the fit was larger than anticipated and the quality felt lacking. I was influenced by the brand's reputation and advertising, which led me to believe I would find the perfect bra.

Similar to my previous purchase, I was attracted to the features of comfort and support without wires. However, the fit was again larger than expected, which left me disappointed. I relied on the brand's claims and my previous experience with bras, but ultimately, I felt let down by the product's performance.

I purchased this item based on its description of comfort and the positive reviews I read. The features such as extra coverage and adjustable straps appealed to me, and I was pleased to find that it lived up to my expectations, providing the comfort I was looking for.

I was looking for a comfortable everyday bra, and the description highlighted the soft fabric and back-smoothing panels. The positive reviews and the price also influenced my decision, leading me to feel confident in my purchase. It turned out to be a great deal that met my needs.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a good fit and comfort, especially in clothing and undergarments. I value quality materials that maintain their integrity after washing, as well as features that enhance comfort, such as breathable fabrics and supportive designs. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be worn for various occasions, and I tend to favor brands that have a reputation for reliability and consistent sizing. On the other hand, I dislike products that have poor quality, such as those that tear easily or have cheap materials, particularly in elastic components. I also find it frustrating when items do not fit as expected, especially when sizing is inconsistent or misleading.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive bras that fit well for all-day wear without discomfort. within my expected price range: [14.99, 20.99]
What specific size or cup style are you looking for in the comfortable and supportive bras you want to purchase?

I generally prefer bras that offer a good fit and comfort, especially without wires. I value quality materials that maintain their integrity after washing, as well as features that enhance support and breathability. In terms of size and cup style, I usually look for a 36C or similar sizes that provide the right balance of coverage and comfort.
What color or colors do you usually prefer for your bras to match your personal style or wardrobe?
I generally prefer bras in neutral colors like black, white, or nude to match my wardrobe and personal style. These colors are versatile and can be worn with various outfits for different occasions.
What do you prefer in terms of closure styles for your bras, such as front closure, back closure, or pullover design, to ensure convenience and ease of wear?
I prefer bras with back closure for convenience and ease of wear. This style allows me to adjust the fit easily and provides a secure closure throughout the day.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Just My Size Women's Easy On Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1107> / Item ID: B08V8YTH95 / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Love the convenience of front-close bras? Here's one that combines front-hook ease with comfortable full support. All at an affordable price in sizes up to 54 DD!"] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire® bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex® Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Ultimate Underwire Bra, Low-Cut T-Shirt Bra, Convertible Underwire Bra, Convertible Underwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0C3LS6FZX / Price: $10.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Say hello to smooth comfort with Hanes®' low-cut, underwire T-shirt bra. The T-shirt-soft knit fabric virtually disappears under clingy clothes for the smooth, seamless look you want. Offering moderate coverage, its plunging front contours will be welcomed by all the different necklines in your wardrobe. The underwire construction is super comfortable and detailed with a stretch front band that helps keep the cups in place. Lightly lined foam cups have inside concealing petals for a no-show look. You'll love the moisture-wicking properties of the soft knit ComfortBlend® lining that helps keep you cool and dry. And to top it all off, the straps convert from straight traditional to racerback styling for even more fashion flexibility. There are lots of reasons that this is one of Hanes' favorite underwire T-shirt bras."]
